name: Grad School Story [Demo]
description:
----A boy in graduate school has forgotten happiness and tries to "remember a path to the future" by looking into the past. 

A short, 5-minute demo for a kinetic novel started for NaNoRenO 2018. More to come.

Credits for Grad School Story ver0.1
Story: a.s.
Translation: DaBackpack
Development: DaBackpack
Music: Sentive, Ambient Garden, and T.S. Bach

Total Progress: 20%
